fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 2Y CAD
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Base = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
RETURN
IF(
    (
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "2 Yr" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "2Y" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "2 Yr Swap" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "18 Month" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "18 Month Swap" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "15 Month" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "15 Month Swap" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "21 Month" ||
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "21 Month Swap" ||
        (
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "6m Basis" &&
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 365 &&
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 731 &&
            CONTAINSSTRING('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL], "FRA")
        ) ||
        (
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Subtype] = "Major Curve" &&
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] > 365 &&
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days] <= 731
        )
    ),
    Base,
    0
)
+
IF(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Yr" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Yr Swap",
    2/3 * Base,
    0
)
+
IF(
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "4 Yr" ||
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "4 Yr Swap",
    1/3 * Base,
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level IF logic to DAX using VAR for the repeated sum ('Delta Down T CAD' + 'Fix Value T'). Translated CONTAINS(...) to CONTAINSSTRING and mapped Tableau IF/OR/AND structure to DAX IF with boolean operators. All column references transformed to 'TableName'[Column].
